actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income any commuter passes received by an employee from an employer.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from an employee's gross income non-transferable commuter passes provided by an employer for transportation between the employee's residence and place of employment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income any commuter passes received by an employee from an employer.
